description: A base corpus for customization that serves files out of a folder
The Code of Federal Regulations at the year-title-part level from 1997-2015
The daily-updated  Electronic Code of Federal Regulations at the tite-part level
All documents in the Federal Register from 2000-present
A base estimator for classification that trains a Random Forests classifier
A classifier that non-exclusively classifies documents among the industries of the 2007 NAICS standard
